Title: Creates the responsible retirement of racehorses fund; horse registration fee
Summary: Creates the responsible retirement of racehorses fund; establishes a horse registration fee; provides such funds be expended to support responsible retirement of racehorses in this state.
LawCode: Add ยง95-l, St Fin L; amd ยง330, RWB L; add ยง387, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the creation of the responsible retirement of racehorses fund; to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to a horse registration fee; and to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the responsible retirement of racehorses
